trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Coupa | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Coupa | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Coupa with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Coupa with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Coupa.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Coupa.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Coupa single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Coupa single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Coupa will be able to single sign into the application using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Coupa will be able to single sign into the application using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Coupa
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Coupa

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Coupa.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Coupa.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Coupa.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Coupa.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Coupa, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Coupa, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Coupa</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Coupa</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Coupa with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Coupa with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for Coupa requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for Coupa requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Sign on to your Coupa company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Sign on to your Coupa company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to Setup \> Security Control.
trans-unit.target: Go to Setup \> Security Control.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Security Controls</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Security Controls</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To download the Coupa metadata file to your computer, click Download and import SP metadata.
trans-unit.target: To download the Coupa metadata file to your computer, click Download and import SP metadata.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Coupa SP metadata</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Coupa SP metadata</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different browser window, sign on to the Azure Active Directory portal.
trans-unit.target: In a different browser window, sign on to the Azure Active Directory portal.

trans-unit.source: On the Coupa application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Coupa application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Coupa page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Coupa page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Sign On URL textbox, type URL used by your users to sign on to your Coupa application (e.g.: “http://company.Coupa.com”).
trans-unit.target: In the Sign On URL textbox, type URL used by your users to sign on to your Coupa application (e.g.: “http://company.Coupa.com”).

trans-unit.source: Open your downloaded Coupa metadata file, and then copy the AssertionConsumerService index/URL.
trans-unit.target: Open your downloaded Coupa metadata file, and then copy the AssertionConsumerService index/URL.

trans-unit.source: In the Coupa Reply URL textbox, paste the AssertionConsumerService index/URL value.
trans-unit.target: In the Coupa Reply URL textbox, paste the AssertionConsumerService index/URL value.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Coupa page, to download your metadata file, click Download metadata, and then save the file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Coupa page, to download your metadata file, click Download metadata, and then save the file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Coupa company site, go to Setup \> Security Control.
trans-unit.target: On the Coupa company site, go to Setup \> Security Control.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Security Controls</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Security Controls</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Log in using Coupa credentials section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Log in using Coupa credentials section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Log in using Coupa credentials</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Log in using Coupa credentials</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Log in using SAML.
trans-unit.target: Select Log in using SAML.

trans-unit.source: Click Browse to upload your downloaded Azure Active metadata file.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse to upload your downloaded Azure Active metadata file.

trans-unit.source: Click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click Save.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Coupa, they must be provisioned into Coupa.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Coupa, they must be provisioned into Coupa.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Coupa, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Coupa, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Coupa company site as administrator.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Coupa company site as administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click Setup, and then click Users.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click Setup, and then click Users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Create.
trans-unit.target: Click Create.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the User Create section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the User Create section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>User Details</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>User Details</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Type the Login, First name, Last Name, Single Sign-On ID, Email attributes of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.
trans-unit.target: Type the Login, First name, Last Name, Single Sign-On ID, Email attributes of a valid Azure Active Directory account you want to provision into the related textboxes.

trans-unit.source: Click Create.
trans-unit.target: Click Create.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Active Directory account holder will get an email with a link to confirm the account before it becomes active.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Active Directory account holder will get an email with a link to confirm the account before it becomes active.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Coupa user account creation tools or APIs provided by Coupa to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Coupa user account creation tools or APIs provided by Coupa to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Coupa **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Coupa **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
